title: Why is casting Netflix on my new Google pixel 3 XL causing an android system failure?
content:
Hi there

I have just received this phone after upgrading my pay monthly contract with Vodafone UK. It works great but there seems to be an issue when I start casting Netflix from this device to my Google Chromecast. 

After no more than a minute of casting the phone will power off and proceed to a black screen with red text stating the following; failure to load android system if this problem continues try factory reset.

After this happening multiple times I finally tried a factory reset, which unfortunately has not solved the problem. 

Could someone please provide me with a solution as I have multiple Google devices to cast to and do not wish to have to deal with this persistent problem ever time I want to cast content to another device. 

Thank you for taking the time to read this. I am looking forward to your replies

Tom
